egov-security:config.jdbcUsersByUsernameQuery: SELECT dm.MBER_ID AS USER_ID ,dm.ESNTL_ID AS PASSWORD ,1 ENABLED ,dm.MBER_NM AS USER_NM ,dm.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID ,dm.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL ,dm.MBER_TY_CODE AS USER_SE ,dm.ESNTL_ID FROM DTN_MBER dm WHERE MBER_ID = ?
egov-security:config.jdbcAuthoritiesByUsernameQuery: SELECT dm.MBER_ID AS USER_ID ,dm.AUTHOR_CODE AS AUTHORITY FROM DTN_MBER dm WHERE dm.MBER_ID = ?

egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlHierarchicalRoles: SELECT a.CHLDRN_ROLE as child, a.PARNTS_ROLE parent FROM DTN_ROLES_HIERARCHY a LEFT JOIN DTN_ROLES_HIERARCHY b on (a.CHLDRN_ROLE = b.PARNTS_ROLE)
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndUrl: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN url, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM DTN_ROLE_INFO a, DTN_AUTHOR_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'url' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndMethod: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN as "method", b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM DTN_ROLE_INFO a, DTN_AUTHOR_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'method' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndPointcut: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN pointcut, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM DTN_ROLE_INFO a, DTN_AUTHOR_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'pointcut' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRegexMatchedRequestMapping: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN uri, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM DTN_ROLE_INFO a, DTN_AUTHOR_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'regex' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
